meanings.definition: A dentist who specializes in correcting irregularities of the teeth and jaw.
meanings.sent1: The orthodontist helped straighten my teeth.
meanings.sent2: I have an appointment with the orthodontist next week.
meanings.sent3: Why did the orthodontist become a comedian? To give people straight smiles and laughs!
meanings.sent4: The orthodontist is like a sculptor, shaping smiles with precision.
meanings.sent5: The orthodontist's office was filled with colorful braces and friendly faces.

meanings.sent1: My cousin is training to become an orthodontist.
meanings.sent2: The orthodontist recommended braces for my crooked teeth.
meanings.sent3: The orthodontist and the dentist had a friendly competition on who could create the best smiles.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the orthodontist of the stars, fixing famous smiles in Hollywood.
meanings.sent5: The orthodontist's passion for straightening teeth was evident in every patient interaction.
